values:
Wow.... this class is sooooooo boring!!!!  I'm so freaking bored!  

AAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!

GOTTA GO....

WOW.... IT'S BEEN A WHILE.  I DON'T REALLY KNOW WHERE TO START... SPRING BREAK WAS GREAT!  COULD HAVE USED LESS WIND BUT ITS ALL GOOD.  AT LEAST I GOT A MUCH NEEDED VACATION.  I HAVE ALL OF MY PICTURES DOWNLOADED ONTO MY COMPUTER NOW SO IF YOU WANT TO SEE SOME LET ME KNOW.  

SCHOOL SUCKS.  I WAKE UP EVERY MORNING AND WANT TO DIE JUST BECAUSE I KNOW AT 2:30 I HAVE TO BE AT CALCULUS.  I THOUGHT I WAS GOOD AT MATH UNTIL THIS CLASS.  HE MAKES US FEEL STUPID AND ASSUMES WE KNOW EVERYTHING.  WHATEVER... I THINK I AM GOING TO LEAVE SPACE IN MY SCHEDULE NEXT YEAR TO RE-TAKE IT CAUSE I SUCK.

IT SNOWED UP HERE YESTERDAY TOO.  IT WAS SOOOOO FREAKING COLD AND WINDY AND SNOWY... ONE OF THOSE "COZY UP BY THE FIRE AND CHILL" KINDA DAYS.... BUT NOOOOOOO I HAD CLASS ALL DAY LIKE USUAL.  WELP... NOTHING I CAN DO ABOUT IT.  

I CAN'T WAIT TO GO HOME FOR EASTER THIS WEEKEND.  I HOPE TO SEE AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE ON FRIDAY NIGHT, SATURDAY AND SATURDAY NIGHT.  I THINK I NEED A SHOPPING DAY SATURDAY.... IF YOU ARE INTERESTED LET ME KNOW LOL.  (CALL ME, DON'T LEAVE IT ON HERE).  

WELL... I HAVE TO GET READY AND GO TO CLASS.... I ONLY HAVE A HALF HOUR TO GET PACKED UP AND OUT THE DOOR.... YIKES!  LOVE YOU ALL!!  

*kisses* & *hugs*

me

GUESS WHAT!!!   ONLY 4 MORE CLASSES.... TEST IN ONE OF THEM, REVIEW AND QUIZ IN ANOTHER, AND DISCUSSION AND QUIZ IN ANOTHER!  SOOO.... THAT MEANS.... TECHNICALLY ONE MORE CLASS AND THAT IS THIS MORNING :)  AND..... SATURDAY..... BRIGHT AND EARLY...... HEADING TO INDY....... TO GO TO FLORIDA!!!!!   :)

I AM SO EXCITED.... CAN'T WAIT FOR MY VACATION WITH MY HOT STOLZE CHICK!  

LEAVE SOME LOVE CAUSE I DUNNO WHEN I WILL CHECK THIS....

*kisses* & *hugs*


Becky

I THINK I AM DYING!  MY THROAT IS KILLING ME SLOWLY!  PLEASE HELP, I MUST BE BETTER IN A COUPLE DAYS!  YIKES!  EEK!  GEEZ!









*10*






*kisses* & *hugs*

I dunno what's going on.  I can't figure out if it is something that I did or if it is just my roomie in a non-social mood.  Here's what happened...

She went to Cincinnati this past weekend right.  Well, when she left she didn't say anything to me, so I had no idea that she had left for the weekend.... hmmmm ok.... Then, when she comes back Sunday I am reading and studying for my test I have Thursday and she comes into the room.  She kinda mumbled, "I need to check something real quick." and turns on the television.  I thought it would be quick so I decided not to say anything and try to continue reading.  Well, 10 minutes later, the tv was still on so I left and went to the lounge to finish reading.  A few minutes later she leaves, without telling me, and comes back with her boyfriend to watch the race.  Then, once the race was over, she and her boyfriend leave again without telling me.  I go back into my room to read and not even 20 minutes later she comes back.  Not a problem except now she has a convo with a girl from down the hall who she invites to come in.  I AM STILL READING!  I don't know if she just couldn't tell that I was reading or if she didn't care.  I don't know what to do. 

Since then, we haven't really talked and I wouldn't know what to say to her if we had.  I am kinda upset that happened but there was nothing I could have done.  Like I said, if I had known she was going to be watching something for a while I would have asked her to go to the lounge (where we have a perfectly working tv) or to someone else's room cause I was working on stuff for a test.  

Who knows....  any ideas?

*kisses* & *hugs*

Becky

Not much to talk about right now except to say.......

12 more days!!!!

*kisses* & *hugs*

COUNTDOWN TO FLORIDA:  15 DAYS!!!


I am so excited about florida its not even funny.  The only problem.... MY ABS!  I totally am trying to get them back into shape so I fit in my bathing suit well. lol.  I still have a lil while so.... until then I am waking up about a half an hour early so I can work on my abs.  I know its crazy, but you don't know how they look lol..... well, my straightener is hot so I am going to go do my hair... leave one. ;)

*kisses* & *hugs*

Hello there.... what a great weekend at home with my aunt and lil cousins :)  they are too cute.  carissa learned a lot of new little phrases that were really cute.  gotta love lil babies.  bailey helped me make my valentines day bag for my door up here at school because he is learning how to write.  gotta love lil kids.

mom and dad loved their scrapbook, or i think they did, lol.  they seemed to like it and that was good.  it took me forever to do it.  hopefully my next one doesnt take nearly as long.  we will see when i get supplies to start it.  

i am beginning to feel sick too.  it didn't start til this morning and i don't know if it is from carissa and bailey who were sick last week or if it was sleeping in what my aunt refers to as the "meat locker"  lol.  their house is freezing at night because of their old windows... i slept in 2 pairs of pants!  eek!  crazy!  so, hopefully when i catch up on the sleep i didnt get i will be all better.  

well... i think im gonna go lay in bed now and try to sleep a lil bit...  leave me warm and loving messages ;)

*kisses* & *hugs*

DEAR DIARY, 
    TODAY WE SAW THE SUN FOR THE FIRST TIME IN WHAT SEEMS LIKE AGES.  IT WAS SO BRIGHT THAT I ALMOST WENT OUT TO MY CAR TO GET MY SUNGLASSES... THEN I REALIZED BY THE TIME I GOT TO MY CAR THE DAY WOULD BE OVER ALREADY.  NO SUNGLASSES :( BUT THE SUN IS STILL SHINING :)
I WILL WRITE AGAIN SOON.
             LOVE,
               ME

~it always takes something huge to make you realize the little things... as you go on with your day today, think about the little things and don't forget to tell people you love them, for life is short and you may never know when it will end~
*RIP~Carrie Beth 

That's about all I have to say today.

Ok so Friday into Saturday we got this crazy snowstorm.  It was supposed to hit 150 miles south of here... (Cincinnati) but instead... the wind blew and it hit Bowling Green!  We were totally dumped on with 10-12 inches of snow!  That is a ton of snow especially when the winds are 20mph and the temperature is only 15!  So, the school did a terrible job of cleaning the sidewalks and didn't really touch the streets.  All of the snow that blew onto the sidewalks after they cleaned them got all compacted and now in many places it is ice.  I think I have decided to let myself fall down on the ice and break a bone and then sue the school for my tuition.  I need some ideas... what would you do?  LOL.  Let me know.  Love you all....

           becky

Goodness... I haven't had any time to write.  The first week of class is done and I have come to the conclusion that this semester is going to suck big time.  I am lucky though... only 4 classes and 15 credits.  The sucky thing is that all of my classes require tons of reading!  Even calculus!!  That's insane.  I think that as long as I keep up with all of the reading then I should do ok.  Who knows... prayers will be needed. lol.  
It's been a boring day.  All I have done is sit around here doing a puzzle and watching movies on tv.  Oh yea... I got to spend quality time with Brandon all day too.  Even if it was just sitting around and doing absolutly nothing... it is still quality time.  hehe.
Well, I am off to maybe play some roller coaster tycoon. :)  Leave some love.  ;)

Well... this week went by soooooo slowly.  But, it was a great last week of class! lol.  I am in a great mood today.  It's Friday... and there's a hockey game tomorrow night.  The only sucky part is that finals are next week.  They are gonna blow big time!  I am totally going to study day and night for these things so I get awesome grades on all of them.  Well... I am starving.... I will write again soon .... ... hopefully ;)  Leave loving messages :)

Great way to start out the week... cancelled calculus class!  Bad way to start out the week: being sick... AGAIN!  Being sick isn't all that bad except for the fact that my illness seems to be the same thing as I had in September!  This is so not cool!  I am just afraid that because this is the second time in one semester that I got this illness I may have to go to the doc. yet again!  That's not the worst thing... I have heard from some people that if my doctor is anything like theirs she might want to take my tonsils!  EEK!  I'm afraid!  Well... I am going to go lay down again... like I have been all day.  Leave some love.

             ~*~ B ~*~

Hello all you wonderful peeps who read about my boring everyday life.  It's finally wednesday and that means I only have one more test (tomorrow) until finals week!  I am so happy... for the next week and a half I will only study half of the day instead of all day, lol.  I know i'm a dork... and now... back to studying lol... leave some love ;)

Thanksgiving break was much needed.  I got to see quite a few people who I hadn't seen in what seemed like years!  I just wish I could have had more time.  I just needed money so I had to break down and get some hours at Robben's to bring in a couple bucks... all you college folks should know what i'm talking about lol.  
Coming back to school sucked though.  After all the great yummy food I got to eat at home I now am back to the shitty cafeteria food... yuck!  A plus side... 2 weeks of class and then finals week and I am home for about 3 weeks.  That's gonna be awesome.  Hopefully I get to see more people, but again, I am going to be working a lot to pull in some extra cash.  We will see later how that goes...
Well, I have 3 tests to study for (one tuesday, one wednesday and one thursday) so I gotta run...  Leave some loving messages :)


                ~*~LINGER~*~

<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3
Yay!  It's Monday already!  I never thought I would be this happy about a Monday.  Well... I get to go home tomorrow and hang out with all the GREAT Cincy peeps.  One problem... I have a test tomorrow and I am stuck in a pickle. LOL.  ... ... ...
This midterm is one of two and then a final exam.  He takes your highest of the two midterm grades and doubles it and then adds in the final.  The problem... I got a 106% on the first so I don't have to take this one but all of its contents are possible items for the final also.  Now... I have no motivation to study at all.  I hope that I am able to know the stuff for the final well enough.  LOL I am just a huge freak.  
Also... Keep looking for fun blonde jokes and little quotes so we can post them around our room and make it festive. HEHE.  Leave love :)

<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3

Wow... I am totally up late for me lol.  Today was a good day but the hockey game sucked and it made the day suck.  We were so mad that they were playing awful and they totally lost.  That set the mood lol... I dunno what happened but we were hanging out and my stomach started to hurt and I was getting a headache... so I totally didn't feel like doing anything.  I kinda felt bad that I was a bum (yet again).  It seems like I always end up being the bum of the group... I hope that's not a bad thing.  Well, I am finally off to bed... hopefully the knots in my neck and back just mysteriously go away... doubt it... leave some love. 

Good night all!!!  Hugs and kisses <3

I was talking to my lil sis online this afternoon and she sent me a great blonde joke.  It kinda sounds like something that would happen to me in one of my biggest blonde moments lol.  Anyway... here it is:

Three women are about to be executed. One's a brunette, one's a redhead and one's a blonde. The gaurd brings the brunette forward and the executioner asks if she has any last requests. She says no and the executioner shouts "Ready! Aim!" Suddenly the brunette yells, "EARTHQUAKE!!"Everyone is startled and throws themselves on the ground while she escapes. The gaurd bring the redhead forward and the executioner asks if she has any last request. She says no and the executioner shouts "Ready! Aim!" Suddenly the redhead yells "TORNADO!!" Everyone is startled and looks around for cover while she escapes. By now the blonde has it all figured out. The gaurd brings her forward and the executioner asks if she has any last requests. She says no and the executioner shouts "Ready! Aim" and the blonde yells "FIRE!!"

Now, let me know what you think and if you want add more.  My roomie and I are always collecting good jokes and quotes to put up around the room and on our door.  Leave some for us!

Now... another thing I saw today...  it is truly a great idea.  I am going to steal it from Jen (a BG friend) and put it in here... hopefully you have some nice things to say :)

"IM me a message with a memory of me. It can be anything you want. Maybe our first meeting or maybe just your favorite experience. Post this on your info or in an away message and see what people remember about you."

I think that is a great thing.  Like I said before, leave some nice comments to me lol.  I love you all!

<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3

OH MY GOSH!  Don't you just love it when you wake up and realize that there are only 3 weeks of class left!  It is an amazing feeling and it made my day!  The only problem was that once I got to class I realized that I have a test in biology on friday, a test in sociology on tuesday and then after thanksgiving break on monday I have a calculus test and that tuesday and thursday are bio lab tests!  Wow do I love college!  LOL.  Well... what a short entry... leave some love  

<3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3 <3

Hello all.  It has been a wonderful day... especially compared to yesterday.  First of all, I got out of every class a lil early today and yesterday my classes seemed to drag on forever... especially my bio lab.  It took the whole 3 hours and most of the time our lab group was just sitting there waiting for other groups to finish so we could take down all of the data!!  GRRRR!!!!  Another reason today was better was the weather!  It seemed like fall again for the first time in a while.  I think the temperature went up into the mid to upper 50's!!  It was amazing!!!  Also, NO CLASS TOMORROW!!!  That makes today awesome.  I get to sleep in tomorrow!  Tomorrow I am also going to go do my civil duty and donate some blood :)  I enjoy saving people's lives.  It makes me feel good... well... a little light-headed but good lol.  I gotta run... maybe I will write again later... love you all!!

                         ~*~Becky ~*~

It has been a long week and it's killing me.  Tuesday, I had a second philosophy midterm and just like the first it sucked real bad.  I won't even know what I got on it until at least next Friday!  That's what is really gonna kill me lol.  And... since I studied my ass off for it I was able to get way behind in sociology... oops...  sometime this weekend I will have to force myself to catch up on all the readings I didn't do.  Now, I have a huge biology lab that I have to complete and turn in by Friday at 3 or something... it was the longest lab ever so I don't know if I will be motivated enough to do it.  Yikes!  I guess we will see what happens.  Leave love :)

Hello all.  Gosh... I can never seem to write very often.  I am always so busy.  This past weekend was a crazy one.  First of all, I get home friday night to find out I have about 10 minutes before my mom leaves for my aunt's wedding rehearsal.  I get ready and am all prepared to follow her out there when my car decides it hates me and doesn't start so I have to go with my mom.  Then, I find out that my neighbor has a warrant out for her arrest!!!  What the hell??!! That is insane!  I went to the Oakie v. Elder football game with Brandon, his lil sis and his dad (the game sucked).  Then... saturday I wake up around 6:30 to begin my crazy day of the wedding stuff.  The wedding went well and I totally felt like a princess lol.  After the wedding and reception I went to a small party for maybe an hour then had to go home for bed cause I had another long day for sunday.  The whole weekend I was supposed to study for my philosophy test that is tomorrow and I didn't even have time to look at it once!  It was crazy!  Now, I have a huge test tomorrow that I am going to have to cram for... eek!!  Wish me luck.  Leave some fun and exciting comments :)

oops... i totally forgot about this.  sorry i haven't updated in forever.  This semester is going great so far.  It has been a ton of work but nothing that i cant handle.  you all know how much i study my ass off.  hehe.  well... its kinda late and i have to get up early to finish reading for class and i have to finish watching the red sox beat the yankees (hopefully ;)...)... anyway... i will be home this weekend to work at the florist sat and sunday so if you wanna see me you can prolly just come there lol  i will probably be there at least 10-12 hours all weekend.  leave some lovely comments.... love you all <3

                     ~*~becky~*~

As you all can see... this is my first entry and I know it sucks! :)  I just wanted to let all my BG peeps know that I am going to miss you all over the summer.  You better come visit me in Kriescher (sp?) Darrow next year.  I will also try to make it over to Rogers to see you guys too.  To all my Cincy peeps:  I have missed you all this year, I can't wait til we get to hang out again this summer!  It will be great!

Anyway, it is finals week and I have to get some more studying done, leave me some comments on how I can make this better!  I love you all.  Good luck on finals everyone!
